alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 05 at 1:32PM EDT until April 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are likely. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will change to rain over the next several hours ending the threat by this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
